case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Near complete or complete skeleton
case_circumstances: Human skeletal leg bones were found by hikers near Interstate 64 in Charlottesville, Albemarle County. Personal effects found with body include boots, a pocket watch, a penknife, and single green button. Images of the personal effects are in the case file.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_footwear: Pair of high top shoes/boots. Dark colored or black. Shoes are well-worn. Right show meansures 11 inches, narrow across instep. Left show is 10 7/8 inches. No size nor name noted.
case_other_items_with_body:
Pocketwatch-back and crystal are off. Brand name is New Haven. 
Penknife-two bladed. 
Green button-four holed
A dry cell battery, heavily corroded. The contents are black, it is reminiscent of a low voltage high amperage electric fence battery.
dental: Dental information / charting is currently not available
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
